Symfony Polyfill / Php80

This component provides features added to PHP 8.0 core:

  • Stringable interface
  • fdiv
  • ValueError class
  • FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOL constant
  • get_debug_type
  • preg_last_error_msg
  • str_contains
  • str_starts_with
  • str_ends_with
  • get_resource_id

More information can be found in the main Polyfill README.
